subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ursula Files/me asking how many are in the house sounds like 8.mp3 
  Uploaded by : kalinu@... <kalinu@...> 
  Description : at the roads hotel I asked how many (spirits) were in the house 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ursula%20Files/me%20asking%20how%20many%20are%20in%20the%20house%20sounds%20like%208.mp3

Regards,
